oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Poets and Prophets - Whitey Shafer - June 21, 2008
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Interview and performance program from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on June 21, 2008. Hosted by Michael Gray. Program starts abruptly during applause. Includes interview, segments from audio recordings, audio from video and performances.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Whitey Shafer
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: "That's The Way Love Goes" -- "Bandy, The Rodeo Clown" -- "Does Ft. Worth Ever Cross Your Mind" -- "All My Ex's Live In Texas" -- "I'll Break Out Again Tonight" -- "I Never Go Around Mirrors".
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Shafer, Whitey;
